name: Maine & Lent
description:
Maine & Lent brings back the acclaimed platformer style with lots of action and adventure, stuffed with shots, challenging enemies and epic bosses.

Challenge your skills by shooting and dodging at the right time, jumping and climbing secret places
and the right time to use the freezing shots or the flaming shots, in this incredible game with phases built to be challenging.

- No internet connection required.
- Over 100 possible upgrades for the character.
- 20 types of improvements available.
- System of Quests with rewards.
- Story mode and 2 survival modes to play any time you want.

Maine & Lent is under development, made by a single person at Unity. Thanks for all the downloads that help keep you working.
